subject: repeatedly executing testcase based on combo selection.
msgSnippet: Hello, In my test case I test some values based on combo box selection in the swing application. once that is completed it executes the next testcase. I want
messageBody:
Hello,

In my test case I test some values based on combo box selection in the swing application. once that is completed it executes the next testcase. I want to test the same method repeatedly based on my selection. somebody help me in this regard.

Regards
Senthil
